question: i have a bad habit of doing sex with my wife from back side. i m ashamed and worried too
answer:
QUESTION

i have a bad habit of doing sex with my wife from back side. i m ashamed and worried too. i wan to leave this habit. plz guide me what are the rules of islam to have sex with wife like this.

ANSWER


Share:

According to Shariah, it is prohibited to have intercourse with one’s wife from the anus (anal intimacy). Any other method is permissible.

And Allah Knows Best
